DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine changes of right and left cerebral oxygen saturation and blood flow during nephrectomy in lateral decubitus position.
DOC.brief_title: Changes of Right and Left Cerebral Oxygen Saturation and Blood Flow During Nephrectomy in Lateral Decubitus Position
DOC.criteria: Adult patients (ASA physical status I and II) aged between 2065 yrs Cardiovascular, renal, hepatic disease, or communication failure
DOC.keyword: To compare the change of cerebral oxygen saturation and blood flow between right and left side in lateral decubitus position during nephrectomy
